name: Fermion Capital
overview:
Fermion is a India-focused growth advisory firm with a difference. We invest financial and knowledge capital in startup companies with potential for exponential growth.

An experienced advisor, Fermion has channeled financial investments in several promising companies and partnered progress. We invest in businesses with an established technological or market positioning edge and good growth potential. Fermion has a well qualified team to invest, manage and create value in its partner companies. The investment philosophy is to pursue transactions with startup companies managed by professional teams.

We like to invest knowledge capital as well. The global marketplace presents many opportunities for new and existing businesses, but it also creates significant challenges. Fermion helps companies and investors identify global opportunities, assess the risks and benefits, and implement plans that ensure success.
